name: possession (itch)
description:
possession is an atmospheric, story-based puzzle game about a ghost and their home. There are many ways for you to unravel this little mystery, as well as multiple endings to uncover. Can you find them all?

-----

possession was created during the month of October for the Darktober 2017 game jam. There are currently no plans for further development, save for fixing any bugs that may come up. 

For the best experience, play possession with the lights off and your headphones on.
